attributes.name: numberOfEigenvalues
attributes.description: Number of eigenvalues to be calculated

attributes.name: numberOfEigenvectors
attributes.description: Number of eigenvectors to be calculated

attributes.name: maxRelativeError
attributes.description: Maximum acceptable relative error in computed eigenvalues

attributes.name: limitValue
attributes.description: Limit value for singularity test during factorization

attributes.name: maxNumberOfIterations
attributes.description: A positive number gives an iterative Gram-Schmidt procedure. A negative number gives a multi-pass Gram-Schmidt procedure.

attributes.name: frequencyControlParameter
attributes.description: Parameter controlling frequency for solving small tridiagonal eigenvalue problem

attributes.name: numberOfLanczoSteps
attributes.description: Number of Lanczos steps to be used, 0.0 result in an automatic computaion of suitable value

attributes.name: premultiplyStartVector
attributes.description: Whether the start vector should be premultiplied with H or not

attributes.name: visualisationScaling
attributes.description: Scaling of eigenvectors in visual results
